game.name: Tachyon Project
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, Remote Play TV, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tachyon Project is a dual stick shooter heavily inspired by classic shoot'em ups. We’ve combined many unique enemy types, a large variety of weapons and power-ups with innovative gameplay to ensure a long lasting challenge and discovery at every new level.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tachyon Project is a dual stick shooter heavily inspired by classic shoot'em ups. We’ve combined many unique enemy types, a large variety of weapons and power-ups with innovative gameplay to ensure a long lasting challenge and discovery at every new level.
